title: taufik123
author: taufik123
content: Of course, you are familiar with Bali, which is located in Indonesia and is a vacation spot for many foreign tourists. Bali has many amazing sights and places and people who come to Bali are also not just on vacation. For Bitcoiners around the world who come to Bali, now there is no need to worry about where you will gather with the Bitcoiner community. Bitcoin House Bali will connect you and other Bitcoiners.Bitcoin House Bali is not only a place to gather but also a Community Hub, Co-Working Space & Education Center for Bitcoiners. This project is an initiative of Bitcoin Indonesia and several international teamsThe goal is to raise awareness about Bitcoin and create a welcoming place to learn, share ideas, cooperate on Bitcoin, and have fun with like-minded people. Bitcounhouse Bali was inaugurated yesterday, May 31, 2024, located on Jl. Kayu Manis, Canggu, North Kuta District, Badung Regency, Bali 80351.https://maps.app.goo.gl/WDUnFZPcy2EZUoAg9https://twitter.com/btchousebali/status/1796574076833812812Come on, for anyone in this forum who is or wants to vacation in Bali, save and mark the address and join the Bitcoin house Bali community. More information:https://bitcoinindonesia.xyzhttps://twitter.com/btchousebaliInstagram: @bitcoinindo21 @bitcoinhousebaliüëâ Donate here: https://geyser.fund/project/bitcoinhousebali

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: It looks cool for Bitcoin adoption but I am cautious to visit such locations and inform people that I am a Bitcoin investor. Risk is big and my caution will keep my staying outside of such places. I can be an outsider and feel happy with this adoption but I am not a kind of person who will join it.Privacy is important and inform many people that you are a Bitcoin investor is so risky.Physical Bitcoin attacks with some old attack stories and some links are dead now.Many months ago, I read some articles that locals don't feel comfortable with Bitcoin/ cryptocurrency foreign freelancers who visit or live in Bali.

comments.author: Yucky
comments.body: This isn't a bad idea most expecially in a society that has adopted Bitcoin fully as this can go a long way to create more publicity and aid local Bitcoin adoption to a very extent.But if Bitcoin hasn't gained an high level of acceptance in your region, then it's definitely not the best thing to do yet as it could attract unnecessary attention from some agency that might regularly visit such location to carry out assault on bitcoinner. Seems you guys already have systems that are working too well for you already and that's just a perfect way to go about this. Create a good social media page that's going to be very active and functional and from the reviews and responses you will get from followers that are engaging in those handles, it's going to be easier to create a good feedback on the level of Bitcoin adoption you're experiencing in your region.

Bitcoin house has a mission to make Bitcoin accessible and understandable to Indonesians. focuses on easy and free access to reliable information and the creation of local educational networks, ensuring that everyone can learn about Bitcoin.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: I like the goal of that Bitcoin house, it's not only for actual Bitcoin enthusiasts but also for learners who want to start knowing more about Bitcoin. At the same time, it's also a co-working space so everyone is free to go and if you're a remote worker which typically is the setup of many folks today. It's a great timing for someone who likes to visit there to be in that coworking space and see how many btc enthusiasts are gathering there to share more about the market sentiment, technical discussions and stuff. It's very interesting if I'm close there and I'd drop by but maybe as a tourist soon since many have been telling me that beaches there are great place to have a vacation.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Well for those around Bali and those who wants to visit they can enjoy whatever comfort that will be provided by this bitcoin house, it's a good initiative but at some point a lot people including me are privacy oriented and minded people who would rather not gather in a place to show that we are bitcoin lovers or holders as their mighty be an attack on our privacy through such gathering. I'm not against any gather but practically I'm not an extrovert so prefer staying indoors all day so even if I'm be Bali or any where close to the bitcoin house I would visit especially if there's any party related stuffs around. The big benefits I see in this initiative is the fact that it will promote the use of bitcoin as means of payment around that environment as products or things will be sold in BTC in that bitcoin house and it will create more awareness of bitcoin.

comments.body: I think Indonesia is one of the countries that allows bitcoin as an investment but not as a replacement for their fiat currency. Since Bali is one of the recommended places for everyone to vacation, I think they are trying to take advantage of this moment to introduce Bitcoin more to people who are visiting and local. Well, maybe one day I will go on holiday there and maybe have a look at the place.
